website_summaries.verdict: An incredible value that delivers high-end features for a low-end price.
pros: It’s got a gyroscope and built-in LED lights, and it’s incredibly affordable
cons: It only recharges via USB, and plugging a helicopter into a computer can get awkward

customer_reviews.title: Great fun this helicopter!
customer_reviews.text: First off let me say this RC helicopter has been a lot of fun for me. First you need to understand that this is a product is not a child's toy so the age rating for it sounds about right which is 14+. It takes 6 AA batteries to run the helicopter and the control range is about 32 feet. I've found that it has 6 modes of flight which are upwards, downwards, left, right, forwards & backwards. The instruction manual gave me very clear step by step instructions in several different languages along with diagrams to also help guide a person thru these steps.This was my first RC Helicopter ever and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Great....while it worked
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our son for Christmas. He loved it...while it worked. Even when we first got it, we had trouble getting it to respond to take off. It would sometimes, but not every time. Now (on day two) the remote doesn't seem to respond very well. It didn't respond (wouldn't even take off) and then it would randomly respond again. But when it did respond, it would sometimes just stop in mid air and crash to the ground. In fact, it is currently on top of a building because it stopped working in midflight and just went down...I hope we can figure out a way to get it down...
customer_reviews.author: Familyof5

customer_reviews.title: Did not receive expected item
customer_reviews.text: The helicopter that arrived was not the one I ordered. Even still, my son was so exicited about it. He tried to fly it ONCE and it fell and broke the blades. Edit: After contacting amazon, I was sent the correct helicopter and it works beautifully! I would 100% recommend this one (black). The red (model 01) is still garbage.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Amazing RC Helicopter!!
customer_reviews.text: My toddler has been into anything remote controlled lately so this was a big win! The packaging first off was great. Once we opened the box, the helicopter was easy to use and figure out. The quality is amazing. It took a few minutes to get the hang of how to fly it but we got it in no time! I like the LED lighting on it so it’s easy to spot in the air. Great product for kids and adults! I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Ike

customer_reviews.title: arrived damaged and did not work
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the rear rotor does not work, the helicopter spins and crashes. Very disappointing as it was a Christmas Present. Cannot do a fair review really because all it did was crash - even broke a rotor.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wenlock

customer_reviews.title: The controls are easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The RC Helicopter comes already assembled, charged and ready to use, just add batteries to the remote and your ready to go. I was very pleased to see that their were two ways to charge the RC Helicopter. By the remote batteries or USB. The lights that are built in are bright and would work well towards dusk. You are able to stabilize the RC Helicopter, making it easier to fly in any direction. It’s great for indoor and outdoor use. The controls are easy to use, just takes a little practice if you have never flown one before. The whole family is having a blast flying it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Real expectations, real disapointment.
customer_reviews.text: I knew it wasn't going to last long with a novice 8yo flying it, however even I tried and there was a problem with the chopper, not the pilot. We read the instructions and used it as prescribed, product did not deliver. I purchased a different one from another company and she is still enjoying it today.
customer_reviews.author: John D.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.text: After it's 2nd flight, the screw that secures the top propellers to the shaft became stripped and the helicopter became useless. This was a gift from Santa to our 10 year old son who has prior drone and helicopter flight experience. We were very disappointed and decided to try and fix this by ordering a new helicopter and making a stealthy swap. Upon seeing my initial review, the customer service team at Vatos stepped up and went above and beyond my expectations in remedying my issue. I would definitely do business with them again as they stand behind their products 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Bremner

customer_reviews.title: controller's connection to chopper intermittent
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my grandson for Christmas and couldn't get it to work properly. It was hard to get the controller to connect to the helicopter, and then once I managed, the connection was intermittent, so the bird went out of control and kept crashing. It was very disappointing to my 8-year-old grandson (and to me!). So I returned it and got a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: A cool helicopter!
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with this helicopter! It was packaged nicely, and arrived quickly! The remote control has a nice feel to it and isn't too light in weight. It has a little weight to it which is nice. The helicopter itself is very impressive! I love how it looks and it feels neat and well built! The controls are easy to figure out and the instructions state everything you need to know. We are happy with this!
customer_reviews.author: PuggyPenguin360

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for teens or adults
customer_reviews.text: This helicopter was perfect! Simple to put together and once charged (which didn’t take long) my Husband and 11yr old have had hours of fun playing with it! The controls took a little getting used to, but it didn’t take long! We love this product and would definitely recommend it!! I’ve seen reviews saying the propellers broke easily but ours had crashed quite a bit and is still going strong!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth descant

customer_reviews.title: Great R/c helicopter for kids or adults
customer_reviews.text: The R/c helicopter was bought as a present for my husband. He absolutely loved it. Flies great once you get a hang of it. The LED lights are very nice. Will keep my family entertained for a long time. Very sturdy built as well.
customer_reviews.author: Misbah

customer_reviews.title: Fun little toy
customer_reviews.text: This rc helicopter is a cool little toy. Takes some getting used to controls but once you figure it out it's so fun to play with. Very sturdy. My kids and I crashed a lot of time with no problems. It also comes with some parts just in case. Looks cool and you can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Mc

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!!!
customer_reviews.text: We've had several RC helicopters and drones and this one seams better than most. It is a little heavier built and will hopefully last a little longer. I've got another to use for parts, although this also came with spare parts. The controller is a little bigger and heavier than some, but it can also charge the helicopter in a pinch without a usb which is nice. The rotary trim knob is better to fine tune than push buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Bozlinski

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Christmas gift! Fun for kids and adults! No setup required and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This has been one of our favorite remote control items that we have gotten for our son! It came already charged and ready to use! We just had to pop batteries in the remote and it was ready to go! With a little practice we were able to get it flying all over our living room! It had decent range, flying up into our 20’ ceilings. Came with extra blades also! We would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Leedy

customer_reviews.title: Learning to fly....
customer_reviews.text: I really like this item because of its durability and it's ruginess. I appreciated how the item was packed. I will be ordering again in the near future from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: A. Huff

customer_reviews.title: Nice helicopter
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for Christmas and he loved it. It has managed to survive countless crashes so far. Love the lights on it too. It moves very fast so you would want to operate it in a room that has space with minimal stuff . Requires a steady hand lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Awful
customer_reviews.text: Chopper can't even go in the air without spinning like crazy and crashing
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive controls
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift. The recipient indicated that the controls were very sensitive. He and his teenage daughter tried flying the helicopter and ended up crashing it more than flying it. He said that it probably takes some practice.
customer_reviews.author: Kirke D. Wright

customer_reviews.title: These are great helicopters
customer_reviews.text: These have a strong battery and are very durable. It likes to float backwards in flight but with a little piece of tape in the front for balance and it flies great. Liked it so much I bought another.
customer_reviews.author: James C.

customer_reviews.title: Zero stars had to choose a star but wasn’t even worth one
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my grandsons for Christmas. I was told that they could not get them to fly. All the usual things were tried but to no avail! Very disappointed and so were my grandsons!
customer_reviews.author: Darlene F. Shamblen

customer_reviews.title: looks kool but very hard to control
customer_reviews.text: its very hard to control the remote has only two buttons and it needs someone professional to drive the helicopter not sure how kids will be able to play with this but for that price i cant complain
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for a couple hours...
customer_reviews.text: This helicopter was great fun while it worked. Unfortunately by the end of the day the lower rotor stopped working. Spent several hours trying to troubleshoot including tinkering with the gears, but had no luck.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could get my money back!
customer_reviews.text: So fun for the first 15 minutes then the very delicate blade bent and that was the end of it.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Defective helicopter
customer_reviews.text: No matter how long this item charges, the rotors do not spin fast enough for the helicopter to get air borne. Rotors spin, but that’s all.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: DOA, DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Tail rotor doesn't work. Common complaint about this toy. They are commonly broken upon delivery. Now we've ordered a second and the tail rotor worked for 15 seconds and stopped working. These things are junk.
customer_reviews.author: shawnplus8

customer_reviews.title: POS
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Doesn’t work. Only function that works is up and down. Doesn’t steer.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: It came in a really nice package!! It even comes with spare parts in case one breaks... its sensitive to control but flies very nice!! Once you get it it’s easy to control and fly!! Very fun toy..
customer_reviews.author: Paula cano

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for Nephew
customer_reviews.text: Arrived earlier than expected. This is a Christmas gift for my nephew and I know he will be so excited when he opens his package. Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this. He is 10 and can control it well. Seems a little fragile.
customer_reviews.author: A Miller

customer_reviews.title: Such a Fun Mini Helicopter!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun toy! The girls loved watching the helicopter fly away inside our home while my husband controlled it. Love the helicopter lights and the size is perfect, very compact and light.
customer_reviews.author: JBsMama

customer_reviews.title: Best remote control helicopter
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this helicopter! It works really great. Easy for him to use. Great product I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy Destiny

customer_reviews.title: My nephew loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old nephew LOVES his new helicopter. He loves that the lights light up red and blue! It’s easy to use and set up! Easy to charge as well. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey27

customer_reviews.title: Fun helicopter for the kids
customer_reviews.text: My kids were really excited to play with this helicopter. It is really well made and flew really high! The kids had a great time flying it
customer_reviews.author: Alison Page

customer_reviews.title: complete junk
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy and broke on the first use. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All in all a great, fun toy to keep my helicopter fans occupied for hours to come.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use once you charge it. Has a cool led light that turns on which makes it very realistic and cool to fly in the dark. Does include additional blades in case they break which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: K.

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for children
customer_reviews.text: Really cool Helicopter but definitely not good for a child. My adult nephew couldn’t even control it. The controller is very touchy to control.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: It didn't work!
customer_reviews.text: The unit wouldn't turn on. I put in new batteries, went and purchased additional new batteries and it still would not turn on. Very disappointing since it was a birthday gift!
customer_reviews.author: MTF

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: We’ve owned a few of these, and this by far was the most delicate. It lasted a week before falling apart. Also, was very difficult to fly/maneuver, which I suppose led to it’s early demise.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: My nephew loved it!
customer_reviews.text: A 9 year old found it simple to operate... may take adults a bit longer!
customer_reviews.author: CherylA

customer_reviews.title: little for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really nice extra pieces small but good havnt used it yet uses the flat battery
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. Flew straight up in the air and has zero control.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No comments i just hope it works when i take the
customer_reviews.text: To bad it didn' t come with batteries . it was a present for a little kid in Mexico.
customer_reviews.author: Esmail

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: Cheep ....had to send them all back...won’t fly just not built good my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this for my grandson who is 9 years old. It is recommended for 14+ but he can navigate it just fine, with a little help from his mother.
customer_reviews.author: Allyn Davis

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made product.
customer_reviews.text: It broke after 4 days. Not happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jade Stark

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: It never worked. But my son ripped open the box so I never tried to return it
customer_reviews.author: Kyah Gray

customer_reviews.title: New...yet broken.
customer_reviews.text: I opened it to charge it for Christmas morning. It’s already broken?! Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ostrick

customer_reviews.title: RC Helicoptor a hit!
customer_reviews.text: It was a Christmas gift for an 11 year old boy and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: elaine pierson

customer_reviews.title: Its trash
customer_reviews.text: The blades fell off on the first flight, this thing is garbage
customer_reviews.author: mike birkman

customer_reviews.title: Strong flying
customer_reviews.text: Flys very well. Its very strong to be little. It is nice that it came with extra parts in the box. My husband and daughter love flying it together !!!
customer_reviews.author: jimmie cannon

customer_reviews.title: Superb Quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality performance, flight time is accurate. Overall, very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Katie J.

customer_reviews.title: Bummer
customer_reviews.text: Had to change my review bc it all of a sudden just stopped working after 1 day of use... : ( will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Waliyah Abdullah Muhammad

product_meta.title: RC Helicopter, Remote Control Helicopter with Gyro and LED Light 3.5HZ Channel Alloy Mini Helicopter Remote Control for Kids & Adult Indoor Outdoor Micro RC Helicopter, Helicopter Toy for Kids
feature_bullets: LIGHT-WEIGHT & STABLE WITH WIDE INFRARED CONTROL -- This creative infrared induction RC helicopter is made of lightweight and super hard material. Super crash resistant during the flight.

FULL 3.5 CHANNEL & 3 SELECTABLE FREQUENCIES HELICOPTER TOY -- Up, Down, Left, Right, Forward and Backward. It can fly 6 minutes after charging for about 40 minutes. USB socket and transmitter of the charge method. 3 Selectable Frequencies Let You Fly Up To 3 Helicopters At Once.

NEW GYROSCOPE TECHNOLOGY -- This RC Helicopter equipped with the latest Gyroscope technology & high grade metal body frame which is used to stabilize the helicopter's heading. Ideal for beginners, advanced and professionals!
PERFECT FLYING PERFORMANCE -- With LED lights make it easy to fly in the dark. Amazing Technology in the palm of your hand! RC Helicopter, No Assembly required, Ready To Fly!
Vatos RC Helicopter all passed several test with certificates: FCC, CE, ROHS, EN71, EN62115, EN60825, R&TTE, PAHS, HR4040, 7P, ASTM. Compatible with US and EU standard.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars121 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
